meta.title: _TRM_start
meta.description: start file for The Rough Mile - without 'Route Checking'

scenes.name: getGPS
scenes.onload: window.lastGpsWarning=totalTime; daoplayer.speak('Waiting for G P S.',true);
scenes.onupdate: if (activity!=null && activity!='NOGPS') { daoplayer.speak('OK.',true); daoplayer.setScene('Scene_0'); } else if (totalTime-window.lastGpsWarning>10) { window.lastGpsWarning=totalTime; daoplayer.speak('Waiting for G P S.', true); }
